705521f-a.title: Brooklyn: Luquer Street - Hamilton Avenue
705521f-a.text:
32-60 Luqueer Street, south side, west from Hamilton Ave. No. 60
is the brick building at left, of which a portion is seen.
June 1926.
Brown Bros.
